original_text:
Therefore they will be like the morning mist,
    like the early dew that disappears,
    like chaff swirling from a threshing floor,
    like smoke escaping through a window.
korean_text: 이러므로 그들은 아침 구름 같으며 쉬 사라지는 이슬 같으며 타작 마당에서 광풍에 날리는 쭉정이 같으며 굴뚝에서 나가는 연기 같으리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore they will be like the morning mist
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 아침 안개와 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: like the early dew that disappears
like chaff swirling from a threshing floor
like smoke escaping through a window
